name: chat-sharelatex
description: The backend API that powers ShareLaTeX chat

scripts.compile:app: ([ -e app/coffee ] && coffee $COFFEE_OPTIONS -o app/js -c app/coffee || echo 'No CoffeeScript folder to compile') && ( [ -e app.coffee ] && coffee $COFFEE_OPTIONS -c app.coffee || echo 'No CoffeeScript app to compile')
scripts.test:acceptance: npm run compile:app && npm run compile:acceptance_tests && npm run test:acceptance:_run -- --grep=$MOCHA_GREP
scripts.test:unit: npm run compile:app && npm run compile:unit_tests && npm run test:unit:_run -- --grep=$MOCHA_GREP
scripts.compile:unit_tests: [ ! -e test/unit/coffee ] &&  echo 'No unit tests to compile' || coffee -o test/unit/js -c test/unit/coffee
scripts.compile:acceptance_tests: [ ! -e test/acceptance/coffee ] && echo 'No acceptance tests to compile' || coffee -o test/acceptance/js -c test/acceptance/coffee
scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:app && npm run compile:unit_tests && npm run compile:acceptance_tests && npm run compile:smoke_tests
scripts.compile:smoke_tests: [ ! -e test/smoke/coffee ] &&  echo 'No smoke tests to compile' || coffee -o test/smoke/js -c test/smoke/coffee
